The NPE is caused by setting filter argument to "null" in your code, if you don't need to set filter function, you need to call another fileStream API.

The not serializable exception is actually a bug in FileInputDStream, let me fix it.

Quite curious why DStream#checkpoint() calls persist internally to cache the RDD, rather than checkpointing RDD, any comments tdas? Thanks a lot.

  def checkpoint(interval: Duration): DStream[T] = {
    if (isInitialized) {
      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(
        "Cannot change checkpoint interval of an DStream after streaming context has started")
    }
    persist()
    checkpointDuration = interval
    this
  }
